titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a credit for the purchase of child restraint systems used in motor vehicles.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1900)
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 9/21/1994--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an income tax credit for the cost of purchasing a child restraint system for use in a motor vehicle.
